info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 12:52PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LOCALLY HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS AND SQUALLS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...CHENANGO...SOUTHERN ONEIDA...MADISON...BROOME... SULLIVAN...DELAWARE...SUSQUEHANNA...AND NORTHERN WAYNE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Locally heavy snow showers which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1248 PM EST, an locally heavy snow showers and squalls were located along a line extending from near New Hartford to near Conklin and moving east at 45 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rockland, Utica, Binghamton, Oneonta, Norwich, Kirkwood, Conklin, Paris, Liberty, and Hamilton. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 3. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 75 and 99, and near 100A. Interstate 88 between 2 and 19. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
